buyer.official_name: St. Michael's and St. Patrick's N.S. (Roll No. 19720P)

procedure.title: 2024 St Michael's and St Patrick's NS: Civil Structural Engineering Services for Additional Accommodation at St Michael's and St Patrick's National School, Cootehall, Boyle, Co Roscommon.
procedure.description: St Michael’s and St Patrick’s National School is a primary school under the patronage of the Catholic Bishop of Elphin. Please see attached Project Brief and Schedule of Additional Accommodation Section A • 3 Pastoral Offices/Special Resource Rooms 15 m2 each • 1 Universal Access Toilet 4.5 m2 • Giving a floor area (incl. circulation and internal walls) of: 67.8 m2 Section B • 2 Classroom SEN Base 359 m2 • Giving a floor area (incl. circulation and internal walls) of: 459.5 m2 Giving a Gross Floor Area (incl. circulation and internal walls) of: 527 m2. Also: External SEN Facilities • Secure Hard and soft play area 100 m2 • Sensory Garden 100 m2 • 6 parking spaces
